prerequisite: Basic Physical Chemistry, Calculus, Biology, Graduate standing, MB5101 or approval of the module coordinator.
moduleDescription: To provide a working understanding of basic cell functions with the physical and chemical principles underlying them. In practical terms, we will attempt to understand a number of important problems relevant to mechanoregulation of cellular function. The assignments will primarily involve reading original literatures under the guidance of MBI investigators to complete a few entries into the Manual for Cellular and Molecular Functions.
